COMMAND.NAME: openwindow
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
x The horizontal position of the left side of the window.
y The vertical position of the top of the window.
w The width of the window.
h The height of the window.

fontName The text will be displayed in font fontName.
NOTE:: if e93 cannot locate the specified font, it will default to one of its own choosing.
foregroundColor Specifies the default (style 0) foreground color of the window.
backgroundColor Specifies the default (style 0) background color of the window.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Open a window with a view onto bufferName . Place the window at x, y and give it size w, h.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
